channel.title: Lock please
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]Reminder to all staff: Have fun![/size][/b][/center]
Click [url=http://xat.com/TUPkS]here[/url] to see our chatroom!
[quote="Davidi2"][quote author=arham 4 link=action=profile;u=468771 date=1327761459] I would like to ask if could add a xat chatbox in my [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533632.0.html]topic[/url]. My chatbox: http://xat.com/TUPkS
I'll remove it when I am almost done with server. [/quote]Uh... sure...
But xat is the worst chat service known to mankind.[/quote]
[b][u]Base[/u][/b]: None now, we will decide on the upcoming meeting.
[B][SIZE=5]Information/Features:[/SIZE][/B]
To be added...
[center][B][SIZE=5]Pictures/Images:[/SIZE][/B]
To be added... [/center]
T.U.Pk.S started from WorldRUINS, to Ulmata, to T.U.Pk.S. Though, T.U.Pk.S had an aim, as, WorldRUINS and Ulmata did not. To know our aim please go here. I have looked through alot of servers, and saw one thing they didn't have, absolute fun. I have seen people quit after only 3 minutes of being on the server. 317 will be eco (for those who love eco). PKing is already at the max, and there will be frequent updates (no annoying, stupid updates), we will hopefully have an awesome community, have an amazing economy in our 317, tournaments (aiming for daily, but leading with weekly/monthly super tournaments), already have all godsword special attacks working 100% (All Godswords have their specials, and will be available from the PKPoint Shop), all spirit shield effects also already added, working on korasi, and we already added perfect hybridding! What more can you expect in this action packed 317? Well, alot more, such as custom ranks (not RS's) that each have a meaning. For example: Gold Member! We will strive for perfect hybridding, well, actually, PKing in general! We will have an expanding community hopefully. And, wilderness will be probably where our tournaments area ^.^. Imagine the tournaments, it will be like an amazing war field! "Enemies, come, found Rebecca12543, go, charge!" 5 secounds later: "Enemy defeated!" An amazing feature, which no RSPS may have thought of will be on, during wilderness tournaments, maps might jam (or to become very blurry) after a certain amount of time, making the tournament to be even more exciting! Isn't that amazing? "Madai, madai, radar jammed, oh damn, they're here, ahhhhhhh!" As you can see from reading that, this server focusses on PKing, both because its easier to code and also maturity of players like PKing servers. Who knows, 317 might have skills to support its eco :|, but don't put your hopes up, because 80% of me is saying: "NO!".
Our aim is to bring PKing to life! And, really from reading the Wilderness Tournament part, you can tell it will be to life! We will have monsters to drop the rarest of items, with a very high drop percent to drop them! More PKing fun with more domination power! We are going to add a quick prayer option to save your time! Our aim is for staff and player to both have the most fun time of there lives, to forget about the stupid stress of school, to just play till you drop (Is it just me, or is every sentence in this with exclamation marks?)! I mean, describing this server is just, alot, I mean, what I have told you is about 1/4 of the server, you can call me a suggestor ([iurl=#suggestor]What's a suggestor?[/iurl]).
[b]Here are what all the ranks do:
Programmers: Code the server with me and other crew members. Testers: Test the game and find bugs. [anchor=suggestor]Suggestors: Can mail us at anytime if they have a suggestion. Entertainers: Entertainers entertain people in the server to keep them playing.[/b] [center][b] Staff list:[/b][/center] [center][u][b] Programmers:[/b][/u][/center]
[center] [ul][li]Snoepie1012 - Youridudock[/li] [li]Mod Nox (In-game)/Neroxx (Forums name) - neroxx[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b][u]Suggestors:[/u][/b][/center]
[center] [ul][li]Mod Nox (In-game)/Neroxx (Forums name) - neroxx[/li] [li]Neon - (N)eon[/li] [li]Nolan - nolan2131[/li] [li]Aetoc - Aetoc[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b][u]Entertainers:[/u][/b][/center]
[center] [ul][li]Snoepie1012 - Youridudock[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b][u]Testers:[/u][/b][/center]
[center] [ul][li]None[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b][u]Hosters:[/u][/b][/center]
[center] [ul][li]None[/li][/ul] [/center]
[b][i]Anyone who enters as staff has to be loyal, follows directions, and can moderate the server. Also, all staff should have all the fun they can have![/b]

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Ugh, yester I was having a bad day. I didn’t give you guys the time, therefore I will move it to June 24th, 1:00 P.M Central Time. For what your time will be, please look at the dropbox folder, I have a notepad document called Our Timings. Also, 1 more day till these are out:

[ul][li]Cog - ciaran6889 (I’ll be willing to accept you later)[/li]
[li]Joseph - jaruanna (I’ll be willing to accept you later)[/li]
[li]Justin - KINGSCAPE x (I’ll be willing to accept you later)[/li]
[li]purez900 - purez900[/li]
[li]Djayboi6 - Dj_ (I’ll be willing to accept you later)[/li]
[li]blizzard1 - Blizzard1[/li][/ul]

This meeting, we’ll talk about our source (the source we are using has got to go).

I don’t freaking care if you deleted my stuff blizzard. I don’t freaking care, we are getting a new source anyways.

Removed myself from the source :(. Made new folder and invited everyone

Everyone including me didnt come to the meeting. Everyone besides Neroxx (as he has gone to vacation and only has his iPad) has a warning of a black mark, including me (I ain’t any more ranked than you guys). If anyone else was in vacation with a laptop then you are excused.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @FusionX FusionX
item.description:
@FusionX wrote:

[b]In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:[/b] William [b]How old are you?:[/b] 14 [b]E-mail address?:[/b] I'll pm you this info. [b]What position do you want? (Entertainer, Programmer, Suggester, Tester):[/b] Tester [b]How long have you programmed (ignore if not chosen Programmer)?:[/b] i coded for like 3 years in differents version, delta : like 1 years when i was new. PI: i coded for like 1 years and half and i'm still coding this version. Hyperion/Azure: 2 month,but i quitted this, i like Project insanity more. [b]What time zone are you in?:[/b] Canada [b]How long will you be on everyday?:[/b] Weekdays, only after school and weekends, depend weekends, i hang out with my friends so but almost every weekend i am on computer. [b]Why do you want to become part of T.U.Pk.S?:[/b] I miss this, my last project was with my 5 friends and they moved... All of them are now in U.S.A, i suggested to them if they would continue the server with me but, they never replied back. Also, i'm a good tester. Normaly i find a lot of bugs and glitchs. [b]What's your email address for Dropbox?:[/b] i will pm you this info. [b]Do you use Skype or Windows Live Messenger?[/b] i use Messenger. [b]Any Suggestions?:[/b] none.

Read full topic
